import Range from "./CardRange"; import { FontAwesomeIcon } from '@fortawesome/react-fontawesome' const Card = ({ data }) => { const imgUrl = "https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500"; let date = "" let overview = `${data.overview.slice(0,170)}...` if (data.release_date) date = data.release_date.slice(0,4) return ( <>

{data.title}

{overview}

Add Favorites

{date}
{data.title}
); }; export default Card;
